{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.19808v1", "title": "Fixed point theorems for small divisors problems", "summary": "In the seventies', Zehnder found a Nash-Moser type implicit function theorem
in the analytic set-up. This theorem has found many applications in dynamical
systems although its applications require, as a general rule, some efforts. We
develop further the analytic theory and give fixed point theorems with direct
applications to the study of dynamical systems.", "main_category": "math.DS", "categories": "math.DS,math.FA", "published": "2025-04-28T14:06:12Z"}
